name: HR Agent
description: An A2A agent assisting with recruitment, policy inquiries, and employee onboarding processes.

skills.name: Job Description Generator
skills.description: Creates a draft job description based on role, department, and key responsibilities.

examples.input: Generate a job description for a Senior Backend Developer in the FinTech industry.
examples.output: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Backend Developer to join our dynamic FinTech team...

skills.name: Policy Lookup
skills.description: Answers questions about company HR policies, such as leave, benefits, or expense guidelines.

examples.input: What is the policy for requesting annual leave?
examples.output: Employees are entitled to X days of annual leave. Requests must be submitted via the HR portal at least Y weeks in advance...
